attributes.action: Put a bid to host the winter Olympics in the 2026 games
attributes.additional_details:
go to this link to see more... 
http://4ndrewharri5.wixsite.com/petition
attributes.background: Why couldn't the UK not host the winter Olympics? I think Scotland would do a fantastic job of hosting many of the events and I think it would be worthwhile at least investigating the possibility of the Games in Scotland.
